name: Telepearl
description:
Game 2

This game is made for a challenge 7 Days - 7 Games

Basically I will make a game per day in a week

This game is about teleporting in precision.

Controls (Controller and Keyboard supported):

Space / A to jump

LClick / LTrigger / RTrigger to throw a pearl

Alt + F4 / Finish the game to quit the game
